WRITING.TITLE: Countering Dark Wood Grain Ring in PvP?
WRITING.TEXT:
TLDR: in Anor Londo, no death run, saved 45k souls (+ soft humanities) to reinforce Paladin Armour once I got it.
Anyways, on the way to Snorlax and Pikachu I get invaded by someone using the DWGR. This person threw poison darts and toxic bombs and then did nothing but flip around until I died. Haven't ever played against anyone using it (or used it myself) so I have no idea how to counter it. Ended up getting invaded a second time on thr way to collecting humanity/souls and got killed in the same way. By the same guy. Any tips?
((If this has been posted before, do let me know. I couldn't find a post on here.))
From when I last checked MATH 101, either 109 being allowed as a prereq wasn't there or I carelessly missed it. Regardless of which, thank you a bunch.

All these responses have been extremely helpful and saved me quite a bit of stressing and repeatedly going over the site numerous times. Thanks a bunch, and I'll definitely try talking to the program advisor.

[For people in Toronto/the GTA area]
I've been looking for a copy of Black 2 the past few days but the only places I can think of--Wal Mart, EB Games, Best Buy--don't have it in stock. Anybody know where I might be able to get my hands on a copy which is fairly priced (so not 60-70+ bucks)? New isn't necessary, but the game in a case would be greatly appreciated.
(If this isn't the right place to post this, would someone mind pointing me in the right direction? :p)
That's news to me. Thanks! It also makes organizing which legendary pkmn to get from where much simpler.

Can you? I've read you need both Ho-oh and Lugia in your party.
The entire business with the bird trio, Lake Guardians, doggo legendary etc. is just really confusing haha.

I did always like Zekrom's design more than Reshiram's.
Thanks a bunch, man.

Nope, that was exactly it, thanks!
